headline: Stocks Rise While Commodity Markets Face Fresh Volatility
summary: The Dow industrials gained 1.1%, boosted by a strong U.S. manufacturing report. Gold ended 1.9% lower, while silver is down 33% over the past two sessions.

raw.headline: Stocks Rise While Commodity Markets Face Fresh Volatility
raw.summary: The Dow industrials gained 1.1%, boosted by a strong U.S. manufacturing report. Gold ended 1.9% lower, while silver is down 33% over the past two sessions.

headline: GE Vernova Completes Prolec GE Acquisition, Accelerating Electrification Segment Growth Trajectory
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., February 02, 2026--GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE: GEV) today announced it has completed the acquisition of the remaining 50% stake of Prolec GE, its former unconsolidated joint venture with Xignux ("Prolec GE"). The transaction, originally announced in October 2025, closed following receipt of all required regulatory approvals, for a purchase price of $5.275 billion, funded as previously disclosed with an equal mix of cash and debt.

headline: Assessing GE Vernova (GEV) Valuation After A 101% One Year Total Return
summary: GE Vernova stock snapshot GE Vernova (GEV) has drawn attention after a year where its total return sits around 101%, with the share price near $726. Recent moves over the past week and month have also been meaningful. See our latest analysis for GE Vernova. The recent 1-day share price return of 1.25% and 7-day share price return of 9.07% sit alongside a 90-day share price return of 32.56% and 1-year total shareholder return of 101.29%. headline: GE Vernova launches public offering of senior notes
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., February 02, 2026--GE Vernova (NYSE: GEV) today announced that it has launched a registered public offering of senior notes, subject to market and other conditions. The net proceeds from the offering are intended to be used for general corporate purposes, including financing a portion of the acquisition of the remaining fifty percent stake of Prolec GE that is expected to close on February 2, 2026.

raw.headline: GE Vernova launches public offering of senior notes

headline: A New Wave Of Federal Nuclear Support And Coordination
summary: A new Dept. of Energy funding bill redirects billions of $ to the Office of Nuclear Energy. It comes alongside announcements of an effort to establish Nuclear Lifecycle Innovation Campuses.
